description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Trapped deep in an enemy city, separated from your platoon and the only way out is the heavily defended highway.   You know you wont make it, but you must try.
description.short: Trapped deep in an enemy city, separated from your platoon and the only way out is the heavily defended highway.   You know you wont make it, but you must try.
